extendedInfo.description: Tired of hearing the same alarm sound every morning? With WakeTube you can wake up every morning to a new video from YouTube. Choose a random music video or let your favorite band wake you up. You can also select a specific video as an alarm for the next morning.If you don't want to use the random music video alarm enter a keyword and let this alarm clock wake you up with the current news, a music video, the trailer to the next blockbuster, a funny commercial, a perfect solution for an Angry Birds Level, or a video of cute cats.WakeTube is a simple, minimalistic alarm clock. Here is what users say about the random music video alarm clock:Rachel T: ***** "This is an amazin idea, now I can wake up 2 my favorite songs every morning :)"Sarhad N: ***** "Genius idea!"Leanne L: ***** "Love this app! Plays different versions of my fav song every day. Great job!"Anonymous: ***** "Thank you for this awesome app. Now I can wake up to Green Day or MCR instead of that god awful annoying iphone alarm sound."Caroline I: ***** "LOVE IT!!! Great way to get up in the morning!!!"Download it now and join the fun! Start every day with a new wonderful song!Make sure that you have a working internet connection and test the video before setting the alarm in wake tube.

reviews.title: Perfect way to wake up!!
reviews.comment: Makes for a better day when I can listing to the oldies but goodies albums when I wake up. Love how easy it is to use.
reviews.author: Kara Scott

reviews.comment: It\'s a great app my n my lil sister hailey love it soooooooo much!!!!!!!!\tDon\'t ignore this app it\'s awesome please I\'m telling u it\'s greater than great!!!!
reviews.author: Tisha Fernandez

reviews.comment: Love it! Choose a tune and set the time. Great way to WAKE UP LITTLE SUSIE every day!\tLove it! Choose a tune and set the time. Great way to WAKE UP LITTLE SUSIE every day!

reviews.title: Gr\303\250
reviews.comment: Oh, that. It goes to another. I need a URL for One More Night!!!

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: The only thing I hope you change is to be able to set multiple alarms, I have a lot of reminders set on my phone and would love to use this app for all of them
reviews.author: Desirea Mazzone

reviews.title: Same songs
reviews.comment: I was really excited about this in the beginning but now all the songs that play are the same. I get a total of about 3 songs... I\'ve tried entering my own URL but it doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Sierra May

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Sweet app can listen to my positive affirmations while I wake up. Should be able to set more then one alarm would be nice.
reviews.author: Patrice Germain

reviews.title: Only 1 alarm
reviews.comment: If you like to hit snooze a few times, you still need another alarm. Only 1 can be set. Works as described, tho
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add share ability
reviews.comment: Add a share ability where it includes the keyword along with the download link to the app. I wanted to share this app with someone along with the keyword search term.. much easier if kit was all in one link.. would definitely get more friends on this.
reviews.author: pat c.

reviews.title: For music lovers to wakeup to.
reviews.comment: This app works great for me. Just what I\'m looking for, new music every morning.

reviews.comment: Used in conjuntion with Night Clock app wake to your favorite song. Awsome!!

reviews.comment: Great app...give 5 stars for this....

reviews.title: Nexus
reviews.comment: This app would be a real blessing, if it worked. Perhaps there is a setting that might fix the problem. I will keep looking. Right now, it only works if I wake my phone first. I\'m guessing that a setting that puts the phone to sleep at night keeps the alarm from working. I would think this would have been taken into account because the factory installed alarm clock does work.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great app would be perfect if there was a history log so I can go back to previous videos. Or my use my YouTube playlist.
